meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or alarm.
meanings.sent2: Yipes, I didn't see that coming!
meanings.sent3: Yipes, I almost dropped my ice cream cone!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me jump, yipes!
meanings.sent5: Yipes, the loud noise startled me!

meanings.definition: A feeling of fear or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: The yipes I felt when I saw the spider was intense.
meanings.sent2: I get yipes when I have to speak in front of a crowd.
meanings.sent3: My yipes about the dark room made me hesitate to enter.
meanings.sent4: The yipes in my stomach before the test was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: Yipes filled me as I walked through the haunted house.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of dismay or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Yipes! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent2: Yipes, I spilled juice on my favorite shirt.
meanings.sent3: Yipes, I missed the bus by just a minute!
meanings.sent4: The broken vase left me saying yipes in disbelief.
meanings.sent5: Yipes, I locked myself out of the car again!
